Class ZobristHashing

java.lang.Object
engine.forBoard.ZobristHashing
public class ZobristHashing extends Object
The ZobristHashing class implements the Zobrist hashing algorithm for chess positions. This algorithm generates unique hash codes for board positions that can be efficiently updated when moves are made, without recalculating the entire hash. This approach is particularly valuable for transposition tables, detecting repeated positions, and other performance optimizations.

The class maintains a set of pre-generated random numbers for each piece type, position, alliance combination, as well as additional numbers for side to move, castling rights, and en passant possibilities. These random numbers are XORed together to create unique position signatures. This class is designed as a non-instantiable utility class with static methods to calculate and update Zobrist hash values for chess board positions.

Author:
Aaron Ho

  • Field Details

    • PIECE_POSITION_TABLE

      private static final long[][][] PIECE_POSITION_TABLE
      Random number table for each piece type, on each square, for each alliance. The first dimension represents the alliance (0=WHITE, 1=BLACK), the second dimension represents the piece type (0=PAWN, 1=KNIGHT, etc.), and the third dimension represents the board position (0-63).

    • SIDE_TO_MOVE

      private static final long SIDE_TO_MOVE
      Random number for the side to move when it is black's turn. This value is XORed into the hash when the side to move is BLACK.

    • CASTLING_RIGHTS

      private static final long[] CASTLING_RIGHTS
      Random numbers for castling rights. Index 0: White kingside castling Index 1: White queenside castling Index 2: Black kingside castling Index 3: Black queenside castling

    • EN_PASSANT_FILE

      private static final long[] EN_PASSANT_FILE
      Random numbers for en passant file. When en passant is possible, the value corresponding to the file (0-7) is XORed into the hash.

  • Constructor Details

    • ZobristHashing

      private ZobristHashing()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation of this utility class.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Always thrown to prevent instantiation.

  • Method Details

    • calculateBoardHash

      public static long calculateBoardHash(Board board)
      Calculates the Zobrist hash for a given board position. This method computes the hash from scratch by considering all pieces on the board, the side to move, castling rights, and en passant possibilities.
      Parameters:
      board - The current chess board.
      Returns:
      The Zobrist hash value representing the board position.

    • updateHashPieceMove

      public static long updateHashPieceMove(long hash, Piece piece, int fromPosition, int toPosition)
      Updates a hash value when a piece is moved on the board. This method removes the piece from its original position and adds it at the new position in the hash calculation.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      piece - The piece being moved.
      fromPosition - The starting position of the move.
      toPosition - The destination position of the move.
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • updateHashPieceCapture

      public static long updateHashPieceCapture(long hash, Piece capturedPiece)
      Updates a hash value when a piece is captured on the board. This method removes the captured piece from the hash calculation.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      capturedPiece - The piece being captured.
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • updateHashCastle

      public static long updateHashCastle(long hash, Piece king, Piece rook, int kingFrom, int kingTo, int rookFrom, int rookTo)
      Updates a hash value for a castling move. This method updates the hash by moving both the king and rook to their respective destinations.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      king - The king being moved.
      rook - The rook being moved.
      kingFrom - The king's starting position.
      kingTo - The king's destination position.
      rookFrom - The rook's starting position.
      rookTo - The rook's destination position.
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • updateHashPromotion

      public static long updateHashPromotion(long hash, Piece pawn, Piece promotedPiece, int position)
      Updates a hash value for a pawn promotion. This method removes the pawn from the hash and adds the promoted piece.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      pawn - The pawn being promoted.
      promotedPiece - The piece to which the pawn is promoted.
      position - The position of the promotion.
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • updateHashSideToMove

      public static long updateHashSideToMove(long hash)
      Updates a hash value to reflect a change in the side to move. This method toggles the SIDE_TO_MOVE bit in the hash.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • updateHashEnPassant

      public static long updateHashEnPassant(long hash, int enPassantFile)
      Updates a hash value for a change in en passant possibility. This method adds or removes an en passant possibility on the specified file.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      enPassantFile - The file (0-7) where en passant is possible.
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • updateHashCastlingRight

      public static long updateHashCastlingRight(long hash, int castlingRightIndex)
      Updates a hash value for a change in castling rights. This method adds or removes a specific castling right from the hash.
      Parameters:
      hash - The current hash value to update.
      castlingRightIndex - The index of the castling right (0-3).
      Returns:
      The updated hash value.

    • getPieceHash

      private static long getPieceHash(Piece piece)
      Gets the hash value for a piece at its current position. This is a convenience method that calls getPieceHash with the piece's current position.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to hash.
      Returns:
      The hash value for the piece at its position.

    • getPieceHash

      private static long getPieceHash(Piece piece, int position)
      Gets the hash value for a piece at a specified position. This method looks up the pre-generated random number for the given piece type, alliance, and position combination.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to hash.
      position - The position to consider.
      Returns:
      The hash value for the piece at the position.

    • convertPieceTypeToIndex

      private static int convertPieceTypeToIndex(Piece.PieceType pieceType)
      Converts a PieceType enum value to an index for the hash table. This method maps each piece type to a zero-based index used in the PIECE_POSITION_TABLE.
      Parameters:
      pieceType - The type of piece.
      Returns:
      The index for the hash table (0-5).
